Uses of Interface
org.sibermatica.io.function.IOFunction

Packages that use IOFunction
Package
Description
org.sibermatica.io.function
Provides IO-only related functional interfaces for lambda expressions and method references.
org.sibermatica.io.output
Provides implementations of output classes, such as OutputStream and Writer.

  • Uses of IOFunction in org.sibermatica.io.function

    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    IOUnaryOperator<T>
    Like UnaryOperator but throws IOException.
